===Definitions===
{{zh-hanzi}}

# to [[approach]]; to [[move]] [[towards]]
# to [[undertake]]; to [[engage]] in
#* {{zh-x|就業|to get a job; employment}}
# to [[succeed]]; to [[complete]]
# to [[comply]]; to [[follow]]; to [[accept]]
# to [[suffer]]; to be [[subjected]] to
# {{lb|zh|of food}} to [[go]] with
# with regard to; [[concerning]]
# [[even if]]; [[even though]]
# [[at once]]; [[right away]]
#: {{zh-x|我 馬上 就 來。|I'll come '''right away'''.}}
# {{lb|zh|used for emphasis}} [[exactly]]; [[precisely]]; [[just]]
#: {{zh-x|這 就 對 了！|That's right!}}
#* {{zh-x|他 就 住 在 街 對面。|He lives '''just''' across the street.}}
# [[only]]; [[merely]]; [[just]]
#* {{zh-x|我 就 認識 一 個 中國 人。|I '''only''' know one Chinese person.}}
#* {{zh-x|房間 裡 就 一 張 床，一 張 桌子。|There's only one bed and one table in the room.}}
# [[then]]
#* {{zh-x|我 做完 就 會 告訴 你。|I will tell you when I have finished.}}
#* {{zh-x|沒有 共產黨 就 沒有 新 中國。|[[w:en:Without the Communist Party, There Would Be No New China|[If] there was no Community Party, ['''then'''] there would be no new China]]}}
# {{lb|zh|used to express earliness}} as early as; [[as soon as]]
#* {{zh-x|我 一大早 就 起床。|I'm up with the sun.}}
# as [[many]] as; as [[much]] as
# {{n-g|Used between two identical word to express indifference or resignation.}}
#* {{zh-x|去 就 去，反正 在 家 也 沒 事。|If you want to go, then go. Besides, there's nothing happening at home.}}
